name: THE SINS OF GOD
description:
This game demo is a boss level based on this game concept. The first part of the map is where the player will need to become proficient before taking on the bosses in the second half of the map, but of course there are also elite monsters in the first part, which means there is some difficulty.

How to operate.

WASD - player movement

left shift - Rolling

Mouse movement - camera movement

left alt-slow walk

Tab-pause

left mouse button-light attack

Right mouse button-Heavy attack

(Combine left and right mouse buttons for different combos)

There is a bug in this version, the end screen may not load properly after killing a boss, you can exit the game through the pause screen.

For this demo you need to download three files, just unzip the first one.

(All assets in the game are free and not commercially available)
